page.title: 01POTTERSPURY:Introduction
page.content: {Potterspury}is a village by the side of the A5 trunk road.It has a population of roughly 1450 people.The village is in rural surroundings.As you turn into the village you pass a long stone wall and lawn. The High Street runs through the centre of the village and has a much used village hall at one end of it. On either side of the{High Street}are two recently built housing estates called{Meadow {View}and{Mays Way. The village has a shop and{Post Office combined.Spread around the village are four childrens' play areas. The largest of these is the Meadow View play area. This particular playing field is often used for football and cricket matches. It also has the added feature of a stream running through its boundary. Several of the older dwellings are
